title: Will the sales tax holiday apply to online purchases that would qualify if purchased in a store i.e. buying a computer or clothing online?
text:
One of our reporters has previously been assigned that for a story to
run sometime before Aug. 7. Here is the number that can provide you
with that information if you need the answer faster than we can
provide. Please call the Taxpayer Assistance and Collections Center at
1-877-252-3052
